question: pipe p can fill a tank in 2 hours , pipe q in 4 hours and pipe r in 12 hours . if all the pipes are open , in how many hours will the tank be filled ?
a car takes 6 hours to cover a distance of 432 km . how much should the speed in kmph be maintained to cover the same direction in 3 / 2 th of the previous time ?
in a stream running at 3 kmph , a motor boat goes 10 km upstream and back again to the starting point in 57 minutes . find the speed of motor boat in still water ?
x is a positive integer less than 500 . when x is divided by 7 , the remainder is 1 ; when x is divided by 3 , the remainder is 2 . how many x are there ?
what is the 21 th digit to the right of the decimal point in the decimal expansion of 1 / 37 ?
what is the remainder when 8 ^ 381 is divided by 5 ?
sandy is younger than molly by 10 years . if their ages are in the respective ratio of 7 : 9 , how old is molly ?

an engineer designed a ball so that when it was dropped , it rose with each bounce exactly one - half as high as it had fallen . the engineer dropped the ball from a 18 - meter platform and caught it after it had traveled 53.4 meters . how many times did the ball bounce ?

of 70 players on a football team , 43 are throwers . the rest of the team is divided so one third are left - handed and the rest are right handed . assuming that all throwers are right handed , how many right - handed players are there total ?
suganya and suriya are partners in a business . suganya invests rs . 35,000 for 8 months and suriya invests rs . 42,000 for 10 months . out of a profit of rs . 30,570 . suganya ' s share is
a sum of rs . 427 is to be divided among a , b and c in such a way that 3 times a ’ s share , 4 times b ’ s share and 7 times c ’ s share are all equal . the share of c is ?
in what time will a train 100 meters long cross an electric pole , if its speed is 126 km / hr
a sum of 15,600 amounts to 21,200 in 5 years at the rate of simple interest . what is the rate of interest ?
a computer is programmed to multiply consecutive even integers 2 * 4 * 6 * 8 * … * n until the product is divisible by 2211 , what is the value of n ?
if 20 % of a certain number is 60 , then what is 80 % of that number ?
the salary of a typist was at first raised by 10 % and then the same was reduced by 5 % . if he presently draws rs . 5225 . what was his original salary ?
if p is a prime number greater than 3 , find the remainder when p ^ 2 + 12 is divided by 12 .
what is the greatest positive integer x such that 3 ^ x is a factor of 9 ^ 7 ?
if x / 2 = y / 4 = z / 6 , then find the value of ( x + y + z ) / z
what is the square root of 16 , divided by 2 ?
if the number 5 * 2 is divisible by 6 , then * = ?

a certain bus driver is paid a regular rate of $ 20 per hour for any number of hours that does not exceed 40 hours per week . for any overtime hours worked in excess of 40 hours per week , the bus driver is paid a rate that is 75 % higher than his regular rate . if last week the bus driver earned $ 1000 in total compensation , how many total hours did he work that week ?

an employee whose hourly wage was increased by 25 percent decided to reduce the number of hours worked per week so that the employee ' s total weekly income would remain unchanged . by what percent should the number of hours worked be reduced ?
a sum of rs . 1190 has been divided among a , b and c such that a gets of what b gets and b gets of what c gets . b ’ s share is :
if the cost price of 24 articles is equal to the selling price of 16 articles , what is the percentage of profit or loss that the merchant makes ?
walking at the rate of 4 kmph a man cover certain distance in 2 hr 45 min . running at a speed of 16.5 kmph the man will cover the same distance in .
a and b can do a piece of work in 10 days . with the help of c they finish the work in 5 days . c alone can do that piece of work in ?
the average weight of a , b and c is 30 kg . if the average weight of a and b be 25 kg and that of b and c be 28 kg , then the weight of b is :
the price of an article is cut by 10 % . to restore it to the former value . the new price must be increased by ?
difference of two parallel sides of atrapezium is 4 cm . perpendicular distance between them is 10 cm . if the area of the trapezium is 250 cm ^ 2 . find the lengths of the parallel side ?
the sum of the fourth and twelfth term of an arithmetic progression is 20 . what is the sum of the first 12 terms of the arithmetic progression ?
jack and jill are marathon runners . jack can finish a marathon ( 42 km ) in 6 hours and jill can run a marathon in 4.2 hours . what is the ratio of their average running speed ? ( jack : jill )
two trains 140 m and 180 m long run at the speed of 60 km / hr and 40 km / hr respectively in opposite directions on parallel tracks . the time which they take to cross each other is ?
in the list 3 , 3 , 4 , 4 , 5 , 5 , 5 , 5 , 7 , 11 , 21 , what fraction of the data is less than the mode ?
the ratio of two numbers is 2 : 3 and their h . c . f . is 6 . their l . c . m . is
by selling a book for 250 , 20 % profit was earned . what is the cost price of the book ?
dacid obtained 81 , 65 , 82 , 67 and 85 marks ( out of 100 ) in english , mathematics , physics , chemistry and biology . what are his average marks ?

angelina walked 200 meters from her home to the grocery at a constant speed . she then walked 300 meters to the gym at double the speed . she spent 50 seconds less on her way from the grocery to the gym than on her way from home to the grocery . what was angelina ' s speed , in meters per second , from the grocery to the gym ?
if the cost price of 17 articles is same as the selling price of 25 articles . find the gain or loss percentage ?

a certain basketball team that has played 2 / 3 of its games has a record of 18 wins and 2 losses . what is the greatest number of the remaining games that the team can lose and still win at least 3 / 4 of all of its games ?
johnny makes $ 6.75 per hour at his work . if he works 10 hours , how much money will he earn ?
sonika deposited rs . 7000 which amounted to rs . 9200 after 3 years at simple interest . had the interest been 2 % more . she would get how much ?
the simple form of the ratio 4 / 2 : 2 / 5 is ?
a sum of money lent out at s . i . amounts to a total of $ 420 after 2 years and to $ 595 after a further period of 5 years . what was the initial sum of money that was invested ?
if tim had lunch at $ 60.50 and he gave 20 % tip , how much did he spend ?
sachin is younger than rahul by 7 years . if the ratio of their ages is 6 : 9 , find the age of sachin
the maximum number of students among them 1345 pens and 775 pencils can be distributed in such a way that each student gets the same number of pens and same number of pencils is :
if it takes 4 identical printing presses exactly 6 hours to print 8000 newspapers , how long would it take 2 of these presses to print 6000 newspapers ?

when greenville state university decided to move its fine arts collection to a new library , it had to package the collection in 20 - inch by 20 - inch by 12 - inch boxes . if the university pays $ 0.50 for every box , and if the university needs 2.4 million cubic inches to package the collection , what is the minimum amount the university must spend on boxes ?
